test_cases.test_name: Air tickets - Booked tickets notification (tagging LM when not in approval flow OR workflow on ticket requests)
test_cases.description: Verify that notification/tagging UI elements exist for line managers in air ticket request processing; check if Workflows section displays air ticket request type as an available option
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.test_name: FE: Show remaining air tickets when balance is on hold due to booking request
test_cases.description: Verify that remaining air ticket balance is displayed on the UI when a booking request is in progress (not hidden or obscured)
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.test_name: FE: Unclear indication of available air ticket requests
test_cases.description: Verify that air ticket request display shows clear numerical indication (not ambiguous notation like '0/1'); check text clarity for remaining requests
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify air ticket balance display clarity: (1) remaining balance is visible when booking request is in progress, (2) numerical indication is clear and unambiguous (not confusing notation like '0/1'), (3) text labels clearly communicate request status and availability
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.test_name: Restricted People manager role - can still see other employees (out of assigned group)
test_cases.description: Verify that People Manager role with group restrictions cannot view/access employee details (work tab, documents, air tickets) for employees outside their assigned group. Test that role-based filtering applies to Air Tickets module specifically.
test_cases.theme: Role-based access control and group restrictions
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

task_flows.flow_name: Request Air Ticket via Mobile App
steps: Choose request type: Reimbursement, HR/Admin Booking, or Encashment
Navigate to Settings > Company > Air ticket policies
Configure policy behavior: set request timing, define renewal cycle, set request limits
Choose redeem options (Reimbursement, Encashment, Company Booking)
task_flows.source_article: Setting up an air ticket allowance policy

task_flows.flow_name: Set Up Air Ticket Auto Encashment Workflow
steps: Select Air Tickets Auto Encashment Recipe
Configure trigger: set date and time for encashment
Set request details: choose application (Bayzat Payroll), select request type
task_flows.source_article: Air Tickets Auto Encashments via Workflows

task_flows.flow_name: Request Air Ticket via Mobile App
steps: Choose request type: Reimbursement, HR/Admin Booking, or Encashment
Navigate to Settings > Company > Air ticket policies
Configure policy behavior: set request timing, renewal cycle, request limits
Choose redeem options (Reimbursement, Encashment, Company Booking)
task_flows.source_article: Setting up an air ticket allowance policy

task_flows.flow_name: Create Air Ticket Auto Encashment Workflow
steps: Select Air Tickets Auto Encashment Recipe
Configure trigger: set date and time
Set request details: choose application (Bayzat Payroll), select request type
task_flows.source_article: Air Tickets Auto Encashments via Workflows

duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Verify air ticket balance display clarity: (1) remaining balance is visible when booking request is in progress, (2) numerical indication is clear and unambiguous (not confusing notation like '0/1'), (3) text labels clearly communicate request status and availability

not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved ticket describing a system limitation (no indefinite carry-over support). No UI change to test; this is a configuration/business logic constraint that cannot be validated through Playwright

not_testable_tickets.summary: As an employee I want to manage my air ticket requests from my air tickets
not_testable_tickets.reason: Won't Do status - feature was rejected and will not be implemented. No UI to test

not_testable_tickets.summary: Client is unable to remove Processed Air tickets
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved ticket describing a system dependency workflow. The issue is already fixed; no current UI validation needed
Permission/access control issue that requires backend verification of role-based access rules, not UI element testing. Cannot validate permission scope through Playwright

not_testable_tickets.summary: Letter requests - upload the document after stamping
not_testable_tickets.reason: Feature request for letter requests (not air tickets). While it mentions similar workflow logic, it's a different module and status is Pending with no UI currently available to test

not_testable_tickets.summary: Limited access for employees to view other users
not_testable_tickets.reason: Permission/visibility control feature. Requires backend verification of employee grouping logic and access restrictions, not UI element testing

not_testable_tickets.summary: Need to delete the test air tickets processed
not_testable_tickets.reason: Feature request for deletion capability that is not yet implemented. No UI currently exists to test this functionality

not_testable_tickets.summary: Need to remove processed (Encashment) Air tickets with Payroll reopen
not_testable_tickets.reason: Ticket is marked as Resolved - the issue has already been addressed and there is no current bug or feature to test. Testing would require validating a fix that is already deployed.

focus_area_definitions.sidebar_expanded: Capture sidebar menu with submenus visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.modal_dialog: Capture modal/dialog centered with background dimmed, show all form fields
focus_area_definitions.dropdown_expanded: Capture dropdown with ALL options visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.data_table: Capture table with headers and at least 5 data rows visible
focus_area_definitions.form_section: Capture complete form with all fields, labels, and validation states
focus_area_definitions.accordion_expanded: Capture accordion section fully expanded showing all content
focus_area_definitions.tab_content: Capture tab bar showing all tabs with active tab content below
focus_area_definitions.main_content: Capture main content area excluding sidebar, include breadcrumbs
focus_area_definitions.full_page: Full page scroll capture for comprehensive documentation
